comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Hi JamesMorris....with the benefit of having access to the large master image and the zoom function of photoshop I had a look to see if it was the Star Spangled Banner....although on first glance it does look like a flag it is actually a decorative part of the building. The trickery of photography:)

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Not quite as narrow margin as enno over on the blog, but I think it is between 15/10/1883 when the parapet on 324 George Street was built (shows in this photo), and 5/12/1884 when the parapet at 278 George St was added (NOT apparent in this photo).  

See notes above and these  [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw]  photos - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/4688966427/]
